data.name: BINGIMAN: Trap Ochido Demo
data.detailed_description:
BINGIMAN:Trap Ochido is boomer shooter inspired action game with a sinister African aesthetic through its voodoo and gunplay art direction.
It’s main focus is on fast engaging gameplay experience and variability/uniqueness of enemies and weapons.

Success depends on how fast and strategic a player moves and the choice of weapon used to execute an enemy AI.
Gameplay involves melee and ranged attacks. Every weapon is unique and guns have two fire modes. Players can equip weapons and customize them as they progress through the game.
Enemy AI vary in speed, strength and health. They are relentless, you can run but you can't hide.

The game features music composed by Alcapaul, Wuod Baba, Deryque, Dead Noize and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
